excerpt: Sprawling historic winery with tours, tastings & special events, plus charming inns & a restaurant.
detail_description: Casa Valduga Vinhos Finos Ltda. is a renowned historic winery in Bento Goncalves, offering tours, tastings, and special events. The property also features charming inns and a restaurant, providing guests with the opportunity to dine, enjoy wine, and relax without having to leave the premises. Staying at the vineyard also offers discounts for tastings and courses at Casa Valduga.
name: Casa Valduga Vinhos Finos Ltda.
address: Via Trento, 2355 - Vale dos Vinhedos, Bento Gonçalves - RS, 95701-720, Brazil

excerpt: Spacious winery amid rolling hills featuring scenic beauty, wine tastings & historical tours.
detail_description: Miolo Winery is a renowned and spacious winery located amidst picturesque rolling hills, offering visitors the chance to indulge in wine tastings and historical tours. As the largest winery in Brazil, it provides an exceptional experience with informative guided tours that delve into the details of winemaking. The knowledgeable staff ensures a pleasant visit, while the option for wine tasting allows guests to receive credit at the store.
name: Miolo Winery
address: RS-444, 21 - Vale dos Vinhedos, Bento Gonçalves - RS, 95711-000, Brazil

detail_description: In Bento Goncalves, a city with a rich heritage, the Parque Temático Epopeia Italiana stands out as a must-visit attraction. This indoor theme park brings to life the story of Italian immigrants who arrived in southern Brazil in 1875 through a 45-minute historical and cultural reenactment.
name: Parque Temático Epopeia Italiana
address: R. Visc. de São Gabriel, 507 - Cidade Alta, Bento Gonçalves - RS, 95700-000, Brazil

excerpt: Interactive sheep farm where children & adults feed, milk & shear on-site animals alongside tours.
name: Parque da Ovelha
address: Rodovia, Linha Palmeiro, 400 - Distrito de São Pedro, RS, 95714-000, Brazil

detail_description: Vinícola Torcello, located in Bento Gonçalves, offers a stunning setting surrounded by vineyards and provides one of the best views in the region. Visitors can observe part of the wine production process behind the tasting room and enjoy detailed explanations about each wine while sampling sparkling wines and other varieties. The winery's approach to winemaking emphasizes wisdom and sensitivity to extract the quality and flavor from the grapes.
name: Vinícola Torcello
address: ERS 444, km 16 Vale dos Vinhedos Merlot, Bento Gonçalves - RS, 95701-600, Brazil

name: Vinícola Salton
address: R. Mario Salton, 300 - Distrito de Tuiuty, Bento Gonçalves - RS, 95710-000, Brazil

name: House of Yerba Mate
address: Linha Palmeiro, 190 Estrada, São Pedro, Bento Gonçalves - RS, 95700-000, Brazil

name: Lidio Carraro Vinícola Boutique
address: RS-444, KM 21 - Vale dos Vinhedos, Bento Gonçalves - RS, 95711-000, Brazil

name: Winery Cave Stone
address: RS-444 - Vale dos Vinhedos, Bento Gonçalves - RS, 95711-000, Brazil

detail_description: Wines Larentis Ltda is a winery that values quality and has been producing its wines using top-notch equipment and investing in new cultivation and production techniques. They produce around 100,000 bottles per harvest and offer tastings of 5 or 12 labels. Visitors can also enjoy activities such as picnics in the vineyards and tastings of aged wines.
name: Wines Larentis Ltda
address: Via Trento - Vale dos Vinhedos, Bento Gonçalves - RS, 95711-000, Brazil

detail_description: Vinícola Almaúnica is a renowned vineyard known for its top-notch syrahs and Quatro Castas blends. Visitors can enjoy a friendly atmosphere with the owner often present in the tasting room, offering glasses of their spectacular wines against the backdrop of gorgeous vineyard views. The winery offers guided tours that provide insight into their winemaking process, allowing guests to learn about the origins and elaboration of their wines and sparkling wines.
name: Vinícola Almaúnica
address: RS 444 KM 17,35, Bento Gonçalves - RS, 95701-600, Brazil

name: PIZZATO Vines and Wines (Pizzato Winery Ltd.)
address: Via dos Parreirais, S/N - Santa Lucia, Bento Gonçalves - RS, 95711-000, Brazil

detail_description: Dal Pizzol Fine Wines is an incredible destination that offers a wide selection of excellent wines. Visitors are able to sample various types of wines and are guaranteed satisfaction with every sip. In addition to the exceptional wine experience, Dal Pizzol boasts a charming park/garden filled with animals, vineyards, and antique winemaking equipment, creating an open-air museum that showcases the history of immigration and rural life.
name: Dal Pizzol Fine Wines
address: RS-431, KM 5 - Distrito de, Bento Gonçalves - RS, 95700-000, Brazil

name: Cristofoli Vinhos de Família
address: ERS 431, |, km 06 - s/nº - Faria Lemos, Bento Gonçalves - RS, 95713-000, Brazil

detail_description: Located next to Casa Valduga, Vinícola Dom Candido offers wine tastings with or without guided tours. It is advantageous to have a car as it allows for flexibility in visiting both Casa Valduga and Dom Candido. Along the Vale dos Vinhedos wine route, it is recommended to visit Videiras restaurant, which serves Italian-Gaucho cuisine and is located within Vinícola Dom Candido.
name: Vinícola Dom Candido
address: Via Trento, 2169 - Vale dos Vinhedos, Bento Gonçalves - RS, 95711-970, Brazil

detail_description: The Igreja Matriz Cristo Rei, built in a modern Gothic style, was completed in 1954 after five years of construction. Its interior features a soaring 40-meter-high nave and three altars. Inside one of the side aisles is the holy water font, adorned with symbolic angelic figures holding the basin above which the spigot releases the blessed water. Situated in Praca das Rosas, this church boasts grape-themed decorations throughout its interior.
name: Igreja Matriz Cristo Rei
address: Av. Dr. Antônio Casagrande, 27-89 - Cidade Alta, Bento Gonçalves - RS, 95700-000, Brazil

detail_description: The Igreja Comunidade São Bento, affectionately known as the "Alpine Church" due to its chocolate-like shape, is a unique landmark in the city. Its design resembles a wine barrel and incorporates grape elements into its decoration, paying homage to the region's Italian immigrant heritage and viticulture. The church stands out with its concrete construction and wooden altar and doors, symbolizing the area's winemaking tradition.
name: Igreja Comunidade São Bento
address: R. Xingu, 610 - São Bento, Bento Gonçalves - RS, 95700-000, Brazil

detail_description: Don Laurindo is a family-owned winery located in the Bento Goncalves region, known for its small-scale local production and unique wines. Visitors can enjoy a wide variety of options at the Vale dos Vinhedos, including stops at renowned wineries such as Vinicola Miolo and Casa Valduga. Don Laurindo offers special visit opportunities, allowing guests to partake in wine tastings and learn about the wine production process while strolling through their grape plantations.
name: Don Laurindo
address: R. das Videiras, 2650 - Garibaldi, RS, 95720-000, Brazil

detail_description: Marco Luigi Winery is a small, family-owned winery known for its limited production. The rustic and charming environment adds to the traditional feel of the place. Visitors have praised the professionalism and warmth with which they were received during their tours, highlighting the informative visits to the beverage production and storage areas as well as the tasting experiences. The winery's cellars, including one with a natural rock wall controlling temperature and humidity, add an extra layer of interest to the visit.
name: Marco Luigi Winery
address: Via Trento, s/nº - Vale dos Vinhedos, Bento Gonçalves - RS, 95711-000, Brazil

detail_description: Vinícola Cainelli is an exceptional winery that offers a remarkable experience. Their Vindima event is truly extraordinary, showcasing their excellent preparation to cater to tourists. The ambiance makes visitors feel right at home, accompanied by superb wine and delightful Italian cuisine complemented by the enchanting sounds of Italian music. Highly recommended, one cannot overlook the significant impact made by the present owners.
name: Vinícola Cainelli
address: 202,6 BR-470, s/n, Bento Gonçalves - RS, 95700-000, Brazil

detail_description: Cave do Sol offers a unique experience compared to traditional grape harvest programs in the Serra Gaucha region. While other wineries offer grape picking and traditional stomping accompanied by music and food, Cave do Sol takes a different approach. Visitors can enjoy a visit with the winemaker, Alex, who is described as knowledgeable and pleasant. The place itself is beautiful with an interesting family history.
name: Cave do Sol
address: RS 444 km 20, 7, Bento Gonçalves - RS, 95711-000, Brazil

detail_description: Nestled along the scenic Rota do Vale do Rio das Antas, Casa Postal Vinícola is a hidden gem that’s just beginning to make waves among wine enthusiasts. Despite the rain on my visit, I was pleasantly surprised to find this charming spot all to myself. The bistro here offers a delightful lunch experience with a carefully curated menu featuring an appetizer, meat dish, side, and dessert—perfectly paired for an unforgettable meal.
name: Casa Postal Vinícola
address: Estr. Buarque de Macedo, 2625 - São Valentim, Bento Gonçalves - RS, 95710-971, Brazil

detail_description: Vinícola Salvati & Sirena is a fantastic winery that offers an enjoyable experience. The service provided by the staff is excellent, and their wine tasting is both fruitful and rewarding. Visitors have the opportunity to taste grapes from their own vineyard, which adds to the overall experience. The market rating of their wines is high, and they offer great prices as well. Additionally, the winery takes care of its facilities by renovating the bathrooms.
name: Vinícola Salvati & Sirena
address: Caminhos de Pedra, Estrada VRS, 855 - KM 8 - São Pedro, Bento Gonçalves - RS, 95714-000, Brazil

name: Cantina Strapazzon
address: Linha Palmeiro, s/n - Distrito de São Pedro, Bento Gonçalves - RS, 95700-000, Brazil

detail_description: Nestled amidst the picturesque vineyards of Bento Gonçalves, Vinícola e Pousada Peculiare offers a stunning and modern retreat for travelers seeking an immersive wine experience. This charming guesthouse features beautifully decorated accommodations with expansive windows that showcase breathtaking valley views, along with luxurious amenities like a hot tub and dining area. Guests can indulge in delightful culinary offerings at the on-site restaurant, where Chef Alvaro serves up homemade bread that is both warm and crunchy—a true treat to start your day!
name: Vinícola e Pousada Peculiare
address: Linha Leopoldina, Bento Gonçalves - RS, 95700-000, Brazil

detail_description: Vinícola Vinhedos Capoani - Vinhos e Espumantes is a boutique winery known for its personalized customer service and comfortable setting. The owner personally welcomes visitors, while the attentive staff ensures a pleasant experience. With ample parking available, customers can choose between two wine tasting options: one with four tastings and another with six labels. The wines offered are of exceptional quality, and the detailed menu provides helpful tips to assist in making an informed choice.
name: Vinícola Vinhedos Capoani - Vinhos e Espumantes
address: Estrada RS-444, km 26 - Prédio A, Vale dos Vinhedos, Bento Gonçalves - RS, 95711-000, Brazil

name: Adega Cavalleri Vinhos Finos
address: RS-444, KM 24 - Vale dos Vinhedos, Bento Gonçalves - RS, 95711-000, Brazil

detail_description: The Winery & Inn Terragnolo is a delightful and intimate establishment that offers visitors the chance to try the exceptional Marselan grape. This small yet enchanting winery has a meticulous approach to crafting special wines, impressing wine enthusiasts with their techniques. The family-run business produces high-quality wines, particularly reds, which are known for their tastefulness.
name: Winery & Inn Terragnolo
address: Via Trento, 1458 - Vale dos Vinhedos, Bento Gonçalves - RS, 95700-000, Brazil

name: Garbo Enologia Criativa
address: Linha Palmeiro, 795 - São Pedro, Bento Gonçalves - RS, 95714-991, Brazil

name: Winery Barcarolle - Boutique
address: Via Trento - Vale dos Vinhedos, Bento Gonçalves - RS, 95700-000, Brazil

detail_description: The winery Winery Michele Carraro in the vineyards valley is a family-run establishment known for its exceptional labels and meticulous production process. Their reserve wines, including Cabernet Sauvignon, Merlot, and Tannat, are outstanding, as well as their sparkling wines. The level of service provided is unmatched, reflecting the care and dedication put into every aspect of the winemaking process.
name: Winery Michele Carraro
address: Rodovia RST 444, s/n, Bento Gonçalves - RS, 95701-600, Brazil

detail_description: Cavas do Vale Winery is a family-owned vineyard that produces a limited quantity of wine with modest facilities compared to other prominent wineries in the region. Despite this, their friendly and dedicated service during tastings sets them apart. One distinguishing feature of the winery is their collection of older vintages, such as 2005 and 2010. While some may prefer young wines, Cavas do Vale Winery particularly shines with its exceptional rose variety, which exhibits unique characteristics.
name: Cavas do Vale Winery
address: RS-444, Km 17,7, Bento Gonçalves - RS, 95700-000, Brazil

name: Parque Casa na Árvore
address: Estr. Joaquim Cantelli - São Pedro, Bento Gonçalves - RS, 95700-000, Brazil

detail_description: Lovara Fine Wines is a vineyard that was established in 1967 and underwent a complete renovation in 2009. Surrounded by vineyards, it also features an old stone house which belonged to the original owner from Lovara, Italy. The visit to Lovara Fine Wines promises an exceptional experience with their excellent wines and impeccable service. Visitors can expect to gain extensive knowledge about wine, as well as enjoy a delightful tasting session.
name: Lovara Fine Wines
address: Rua José Benedetti, 222 - salgado, Bento Gonçalves - RS, 95706-500, Brazil

detail_description: Vinícola Dom Bernardo in Vale dos Vinhedos is known for its exceptional wines that are unlike those found in larger wineries. The family-run establishment offers a delightful tasting experience, making you feel at home while chatting with friends. The service provided by Mateus is top-notch and the overall visit comes highly recommended. This winery stands out for its wonderful wines, making it a must-visit destination for wine enthusiasts looking to explore the unique flavors of Vale dos Vinhedos.
name: Vínicola Dom Bernardo
address: R. das Videiras, 3051 - Garibaldi, RS, 95720-000, Brazil

detail_description: The Sítio de Lazer Zucchi is a stunning destination with picturesque scenery, an ideal spot for a family picnic or barbecue. It boasts a spacious area with well-maintained lawns and a serene lake. Visitors can also enjoy the convenience of various amenities such as kiosks and lounges, along with the barbecue facilities. All this is surrounded by beautiful vineyards, which add to the charm of this tourist attraction.
name: Sítio de Lazer Zucchi
address: Linha Eulália Interior, Bento Gonçalves - RS, 95709-899, Brazil

detail_description: Vinícola Mena Kaho offers a superb selection of wines and juices, making it an exceptional choice for those seeking a delightful dining experience. Additionally, this winery presents an array of traditional Italian dishes to satisfy your cravings. With a delectable variety of options available, Vinícola Mena Kaho ensures an enjoyable time for all patrons in search of authentic flavors.
name: Vinícola Mena Kaho
address: R. Joaquim Toniollo, 635 Bairro - São Vendelino, Bento Gonçalves - RS, 95707-498, Brazil

detail_description: The winery Dom Eliziario offers an unforgettable sensory experience with their exceptional wine selection. Highly recommended, this cozy establishment features a unique mimosa chapel. The warm and welcoming Pedro and his family share their extensive knowledge, transforming the way one tastes wine. Situated in a picturesque location overlooking a stunning valley of vineyards, the owner personally guides visitors through tastings, imparting wisdom on various techniques such as differentiating between wines using each nostril.
name: Dom Eliziario
address: Rod RST 444 Km 23 s/n, Vale dos Vinhedos, Bento Gonçalves - RS, 95711-000, Brazil

detail_description: Videiras Carraro is a family winery that offers a unique and pleasant experience, different from commercial ones. Visitors have praised the kindness of the staff and the quality of the wines. The breathtakingly beautiful grape vines provide a picturesque backdrop for wine tasting and relaxation. Many recommend trying the grape juice as well. The vineyard also offers an opportunity to enjoy lunch with options like mushroom pizza and cold cuts board paired with locally made sparkling wine.
name: Videiras Carraro
address: Via Trento, 1458 - Vale dos Vinhedos, Bento Gonçalves - RS, 95700-000, Brazil

detail_description: Museu do Imigrante is housed in a historic building from 1913, recognized by the IPHAN. The museum's two floors showcase the history of Italian immigration through an extensive collection of over 15,000 items including photographs, objects, and documents. Visitors can explore permanent exhibits featuring old artifacts and replicas of immigrant life. Additionally, temporary exhibitions add to the experience. The museum offers free admission and is open from Tuesday to Saturday.
name: Museu do Imigrante
address: R. Herny Hugo Dreher, 127 - Planalto, Bento Gonçalves - RS, 95700-000, Brazil

detail_description: Monte Chiaro Vinhos Finos is a new winery in Bento with a unique atmosphere, recommended by locals. The space offers a pet-friendly environment and parking. Visitors can enjoy the sunset experience, which includes wine and sparkling wine tastings accompanied by a cold cuts board. The attentive staff provides brief explanations of each wine served. Guests appreciate the unpretentious and leisurely tasting experience, where they can savor the wines without feeling rushed or pressured to make purchases.
name: Monte Chiaro Vinhos Finos
address: Via Trento, 785 - Vale dos Vinhedos, Bento Gonçalves - RS, 95711-000, Brazil

detail_description: Opened in 2005, the Monument to Immigrants pays tribute to those who left their respective countries and settled in the Serra Gaucha region, seeking a new home for various reasons. This monument specifically commemorates the Italian immigrants who colonized the lands of Bento Goncalves, marking 130 years of Italian immigration in Rio Grande do Sul. Despite showing signs of deterioration over time, it still retains its inherent beauty and symbolic significance.
name: Monument to Immigrants
address: 1236, Av. Planalto, 1228 - São Bento, Bento Gonçalves - RS, 95700-000, Brazil

excerpt: Enduring winery from 1931 offering guided tours & tastings in a restored cellar with vaulted arches.
detail_description: Vinícola Aurora is a historic winery established in 1931, offering guided tours and tastings in a beautifully restored cellar with vaulted arches. It is Brazil's largest and most acclaimed winery, known for its commercial accessibility. The cooperative began with 16 families and has since become a prominent name in the industry. Visitors can enjoy an excellent tour experience, led by knowledgeable guides like Julia who provide insightful commentary during tastings.
name: Cooperativa Vinícola Aurora | Citta
address: R. Olavo Bilac, 500 - Cidade Alta, Bento Gonçalves - RS, 95700-362, Brazil

detail_description: The winery Gran Legacy Wine & Sparkling Wine provides a pleasant, clean, well-organized, and spacious environment for visitors. However, it lacks attractiveness and is merely a retail store of the brand without many unique features. Despite prior knowledge of the brand, customers may discover different flavors in the store that are not offered for tasting unless specifically requested.
name: Gran Legacy Wine & Sparkling Wine
address: Linha Leopoldina, Km 06, Bento Gonçalves - RS, 95711-000, Brazil

name: Casa Zottis - Vinhos e Uvas
address: RS-444, km 23,5, Bento Gonçalves - RS, 95711-990, Brazil

detail_description: Vistamontes Winery is renowned for its stunning landscapes and exceptional family-oriented service. It is truly delightful to witness their deep affection for the earth, evident in their diligent work and top-notch products. Recently, it has come to our attention that Vistamontes is expanding its production to include wines and sparkling varieties. We wholeheartedly wish them success in this new venture.
name: Vistamontes Vinícola
address: Estrada Santo Antônio da Linha Paulina, 861 Distrito, Bento Gonçalves - RS, 95713-000, Brazil

name: Stadium of Mountain Vineyards
address: São Vendelino, Bento Gonçalves - RS, 95700-000, Brazil

detail_description: Vinícola Battistello, a family-owned winery, offers an exceptional experience with attentive owners who engage in delightful conversations. The sparkling wine produced by the winery is truly delicious. Visitors are greeted with incredible warmth and hospitality, while also enjoying a wide selection of juices and wines. It is not uncommon for guests to leave with bags full of purchases from this fantastic establishment.
name: Vinícola Battistello
address: R. das Videiras, 3199 - Garibaldi, RS, 95720-000, Brazil

detail_description: Nestled in the picturesque village of Faria Lemos, Estrelas do Brasil - Wine Shop is a must-visit destination for wine enthusiasts. This charming winery offers an exquisite selection of white, red, and sparkling wines that promise to tantalize your taste buds. Guests can enjoy a delightful tasting experience with well-spaced seating arrangements and the option to savor cold cuts alongside their wine selections. The stunning views from this location are simply breathtaking, making it an ideal spot for relaxation and enjoyment.
name: Estrelas do Brasil - Wine Shop
address: Vila Faria Lemos, s/n - Faria Lemos, Bento Gonçalves - RS, 95713-000, Brazil

name: Della Mastela - Vinhos de Família
address: RS-444, Km 24 - 4 - Vale dos Vinhedos, Bento Gonçalves - RS, 95711-990, Brazil
